title: Here's a reading list of 20 articles on the topic of hallucinations in large language models (LLMs) up to 2024. These articles cover various aspects, including the causes, detection, mitigation strategies, and implications of hallucinations in LLMs

author.literal: **"Understanding and Mitigating Hallucinations in Neural Machine Translation"** - Koehn, P., & Knowles, R.

title: **"Hallucinations in Neural Machine Translation: Types, Causes, and Solutions"**

container-title: **"The Curious Case of Hallucinations in Neural Machine Translation"**

title: **"Detecting Hallucinated Content in Conditional Neural Sequence Generation"**

author.literal: **"Mitigating Hallucinations in Sequence-to-Sequence Models"** - Li, J., & Jurafsky, D.

title: **"Hallucination in Neural Machine Translation: A Survey"**

container-title: **"Evaluating and Reducing Hallucinations in Multimodal Neural Machine Translation"**

title: **"Hallucination in Natural Language Generation: A Survey"**
**"Towards Faithful Neural Table-to-Text Generation with Content-Matching Constraints"**
**"Faithfulness and Factuality in Generative Models: A Systematic Survey of Metrics and Methods"**

container-title: **"Reducing Hallucination in Neural Machine Translation with Model Uncertainty"**

title: **"Hallucination in Neural Text Generation: A Causal Perspective"**
**"Mitigating Hallucinations in Neural Text Generation with Reinforcement Learning"**

author.literal: **"A Comprehensive Survey on Hallucination in Neural Text Generation"** - Wang, T., & Zhang, M.

container-title: **"Hallucination in Neural Machine Translation: Causes and Mitigation Strategies"**

title: **"Faithful and Factual Text Generation with Neural Networks"**

author.literal: **"Detecting and Mitigating Hallucinations in Neural Text Generation"** - Liu, H., & Chen, M.

title: **"Hallucination in Neural Text Generation: A Survey of Recent Progress"**
**"Towards Robust Neural Text Generation: Addressing Hallucinations and Ensuring Faithfulness"**
**"Hallucination in Large Language Models: Challenges and Future Directions"**
These articles should provide a comprehensive overview of the current state of research on hallucinations in LLMs, including theoretical insights, practical challenges, and potential solutions
